column1: I’ve seen a few posts on ancient Chinese medicines that can inhibit the corona virus .chinese authorities say that is doesn’t work but thousands of Chinese are buying it from chemists around china .regardless I have a gut feeling the Chinese are hiding the real truth
I hear that a China court has given the ok to kill 20.000.infected people  to help stop the spread of the corona virus .dont know if its factual .but then again its China
